import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { ROUTE_LANDING_PAGE } from "../../Routes/RouteMapping"; import { launchSDK } from "../../utils/helpers"; import { InvertedPrimaryButton, PrimaryButton, FullScreenLoader, } from "../index"; import "./GenericMessage.scss"; function InstagramGenericMessage() { const [loader, SetLoader] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); cosnt return (

Before you proceed, please remember

Instagram has some mandatory login requirements. This allows us to get your profile, audience, and campaign data.

  1. Your Instagram account needs to be a Creator or Business account.

    See how to convert your account to a Creator account.

    Need more help? Check the help guide here.
  2. Your Instagram account needs to be linked to a Facebook Page.

    See how to link your Instagram account to a Facebook page.

    Need more help? Check the help guide here.
  3. See how to link your Instagram account to a Facebook page.
  4. While logging in, please select the correct combination of Instagram account and Facebook page.
launchSDK(SetLoader, navigate)} htmlType="submit" label="Proceed" style={{ marginRight: "24px" }} // loading={loading} /> navigate(ROUTE_LANDING_PAGE)} htmlType="submit" label="Back" // loading={loading} />
); } export default InstagramGenericMessage;
